attributes.action: Get tony Blair to read these petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not believe that Tony Blair actually reads these petitions and I think he should because it is part of listening to his community which he is surposed to do to help the areas we live in. So you should sign this to show him (which i will show him some how) what the puplic think and want for their community.
